name: Green Wheat Mini Me
description:
Ooooh it's so cute. A mini scatter version of it's more grown-up big brother green wheat cushion. This little smasher features the classy Holli Zollinger green wheat linen print, piped with yellow linen and flipped with grey marl wool. A little bit luxurious. You might just want to hug it so much you keep it down your jumper.

Approx 12" x10" foam inner.

Made in Bristol.

Wheat-free. Gluten-free. Made in an area which cannot be guaranteed nut-free. Make of that what you will.

name: Stick a Bird On It Cushion
description:
Cotton linen print front with dainty birds and ghostly trees. Flipped in grey marl wool (perfect for snuggling). One version has yellow linen piping, the other is pied in bird material. Please select your choice at the checkout. Or, if you're shopping drunk, might we respectfully recommend BUYING BOTH OF THEM?

17" x17" foam inner. 

Made in Bristol. No birds were harmed in the making of this cushion.

Remember: we all deserve happy bottoms.

name: Waving Not Drowning Cushion
description:
Dreamy navy wave linen print front. Piped, either in black wool or pink linen (choose at checkout). Flipped in grey linen (it goes with EVERYTHING). 

Foam inner. 18" x 18".

Excellent for meditating upon, or even sitting upon, if you're that way inclined.

Hand-made in Bristol by Tickety-Boo's own fair hands. 

Not actual waves.

name: Sanderson Festival Cushion
description:
I think the description, above, rather covers it but here goes.

Modern classic, Sanderson Festival in Red colourway, flipped with black wool (oooooh) and yellow linen piping. Oh yes please, don't mind if I do!

Foam inner, approx, 30cm x 50cm

Made in Bristol. With blood, sweat & tears. 

Sorry about the ridiculous postage charge. I blame George Osborne & Vince Cable. I'll refund it if you collect it or if I can drop it off when I'm out and about on my bicycle.

name: Nautilus Cushion
description:
AHOY THAR!

Mary Warren's classic design for Sanderson, in Black, piped in the black, flipped with light blue or dusky pink linen.

Rescued and re-cycled into cushions, this was an original piece of Sanderson fabric, but because of sun-wear it has some fading. Beautiful, but vintage. Or, should that be, beautiful AND vintage? Like, umm, Sandra Bullock. Yeah? Better than some new piece. And all the better for a bit of fading.

New foam inner. Approx 40cm x 40cm. Unzipped.

Made in Bristol. Absolutely not by elves. Collection in person will not only refund your postage costs but entitle you to a tour of the sweatshop, I mean, *studio*, and possibly some bombay mix.

BTW, I'm sorry about the postage but IT COSTS A FORTUNE. Come and pick it up!

name: Pretty in Pink Round Cocktail Chair SOLD!
description:
Re-vamped (and we use the word advisedly) dainty cocktail chair with curves reminiscent of Christina Hendricks'. Piped and primped in Zoffany pink geometric Meridien fabric. 

Purrfect with gin, vodka, cinzano and olives on tiny toothpicks. 

Made very Tickety-Boo in Bristol, just for you. Yes, you.
Delivery by arrangement. It might be between £20-£50 depending on where you are in the UK. Obviously free to you lucky people in Bristol.

Fabric sample available on request.

H 77cm x W 53cm x D 55cm

name: Ercol Armchair in Zoffany Meridien
description:
OOH OOH. Hello my lovely. Aren't you a PICTURE!

Classic vintage Ercol Windsor Armchair, stripped of old varnish and finished in Danish oil and waxed to a terrifyingly smooth finish. 

The seat pad is re-covered with the gorgeously geometrically inclined Zoffany fabric, piped and zipped. Two sewn-in buttoned scatter cushions give you comfort without compromising on looks and show off those lovely back spindles.

Vintage frame, with a few dinks, but in very good condition. Sound frame and proper Pirelli webbing.

H 85cm x W 68cm x D 66cm. Seat to floor height 40cm.

Magiked in our sweatshop, using thread, elbow grease and powered by jelly babies. Shipping by arrangement (usually between £30-£60, depending on how far you are from sunny Bristol). This item is also for sale on other sites (although this is the cheapest), so get clicking in order to avoid crushing disappointment. Fabric and more detailed photos available upon request.

name: Bridewell Beauty
description:
Re-covered, splayed-legged, Zoffany Meander Geranium in Pink, 60s style vintage bedroom-boudoir chair. 

It's pink. It's piped. It's got lovely legs. Basically, it's a one-off dreamboat.

90cm x 50cm x 50cm

Rescued from Stroud. Re-upholstered in Bristol. 

Free delivery in Bristol city.

name: Blue Stunner Stool
description:
Vintage mid-century footstool sanded, stripped, ripped and buttoned up in yellow linen. Put your feet up and enjoy the slender ankles of this little beauty. All new foam. Waxed legs. Sounds like the perfect date, right?

The patterned fabric is by Holli Zollinger. It's vintage but modern, if that makes sense. It's a cotton-linen mix and a little bit beautiful, no?

Dimensions TBC, when I get back to the workshop. 

Free delivery in Bristol.

Made in Bristol. No animals were hurt in the manufacture of this stool. I didn't even bang any of my fingers.

name: Green Wheat Cushion
description:
Green Holli Zollinger linen-cotton mix front, piped with colour-popping yellow linen and a soft grey weave reverse. A classy retro combination.

15" x 15" foam pad, unzipped.

Made in my sweatshop in Bristol. Not suitable for the colour-shy.

Can be made to order.

name: Blue Wheat Cushion
description:
Ahhh. Linen-cotton mix retro inspired Holli Zollinger print, piped with baby blue linen and flipped with grey.

Foam inner. 15" x 15". Unzipped. Looks good on nearly anything. Really, I don't know how we do it. Variations can be made of this (different coloured piping or flip- just get in touch).

Made in Bristol. Not made from actual wheat.

Free delivery in Brizzle city.

name: Yellow and Blue Pires Cushion
description:
Absolutely BOSS Cristina Pires cotton-linen print, piped with yellow linen and flipped with grey linen.

15" x 15" feather filled pad, unzipped. 

I can button this for you, if you fancy. Or I can leave well alone-it might be gilding the lily, no?

Made in my damp workshop with freezing fingers in Bristol. Buy it and let me turn the heating on.

Can make variations for this to order. Just get in touch. It looks l o v e l y with a blue reverse.

Free shipping in Bristol.

options.name: As above but flipside blue is brighter blue linen

name: Totally Triangle Cushion
description:
Cotton-Linen Spoonflower print by Pennycandy, yellow linen piping, grey linen reverse. Guaranteed soft, not pointy. I'll let the colours speak for themselves.

20" x 12" foam pad. Non-removable.

Made in Bristol.

name: Love Triangle Square Cushion
description:
Pretty much perfect Pennycandy cotton-linen print, with yellow linen piping and grey linen flip-side.

Can one have a square love triangle? Buy it and find out.

14" x 14" feather pad filled, unzipped.

Made in Bristol. 
Please note: purchase of this cushion does not guarantee a love triangle, just a CUSHION with TRIANGLES on it.

name: Ercol Two-Seater Blonde
description:
Oh My Goodness. We spoil you, we really do.

This is a rare, upright blonde Ercol two-seater spindle-back sofa. Sound woodwork. Spiffing rubber webbing. All new foam seat pad and scatter cushions.

Re-upholstered in grey speckled, very hardwearing, Camira Kendal weave fabric, finished with yellow linen piping and buttons.

A few dinks on the legs, but otherwise in excellent vintage condition.

Would look REALLY SPIFFING with a Tickety-Boo scatter cushion. Oh, go on then, I'll throw one of them in. Take your pick from the shop.

130cm long x 80cm high x 65cm deep

More pictures available. Can supply you with fabric samples. Happy to help with shipping (I usually use someone from Shiply).

Re-furbished in Bristol. Very Tickety-Boo.

SOLD! Contact me and maybe I can make one for you!

name: Ottoman-mania
description:
OK. This is a LUSH footstool/ fancy magazine table/ottoman. 

New foam is covered in Camira grey Craggan 100% wool with blue flecks. The buttons are in Camira  wool from the same series but in a variety of heathland-inspired colours. It's classy, it smells of wool. It's sturdy and perfect for feet, glossy mags and arty books. Maybe the odd plate of fancy cupcakes. Probably not a glass of wine. But certainly a plate. 

We can send you a sample of the grey-blue if you think it might be for you.

63cm x 83cm x 30cm

Completely unique. Made in Bristol. By a sole trader who pays her taxes (unlike the big brands). The blonde wood legs unscrew, making transportation easier if you live elsewhere. Why not move to Bristol? It's LOVELY here. Plus we can ship you items for free in the city limits.

name: Ercol Day-Bed Couch/ Studio Couch
description:
*s w o o n s* 

S O L D

The original British classic mid-century designer day bed, sewn-in with hard-wearing British Camira fabric. Blonde beech/elm wood, spindles, cheeky-ankled legs and a breathtakingly beautiful back board which is removeable if you don't trust your guests not to lick it.

All new Pirelli webbing. The woodwork is sound, buffed and polished and in very good condition. There are a few minor scuffs and dents, including a compression on the corner of the otherwise impeccable backboard, commensurate with its age- but no cracks or splits. More pictures available on demand.

Available as shown (excluding the three scatter cushions), for the price shown, or Tickety-Boo can re-upholster this in a fabric of your choice and furnish it with brand new foam. For example, a brand new wool piped cover and pad for an extra £170.00- just get in touch and let's get you something truly Tickety-Boo to sit on. 

We will even throw in a cushion of your choice from our shop- although we're sure you have lots of lovely cushions begging to be re-homed on this beauty.

W 206cm D 88cm H 79cm SH incl. cushion 46cm

Re-upholstered in Bristol. With love. To be perfectly honest, I don't want to sell this. I just want to lie on it all day, drinking dirty martinis...

I might be able to arrange delivery in Bristol/area.

name: Ercol Windsor Two-Seater
description:
A British design CLASSIC, re-upholstered in another British product, Camira 100% wool.

The frame is the much sought-after blond, in good, but not pristine condition. There is wear and tear on the front legs but the frame is solid, sound and sturdy. The pirelli webbing is sound and sagging strips have been replaced for many years of happy bouncing.

Fire reg. compliant foam seat pad is zipped in BEAUTIFUL grey wool with blue weave. Three scatter cushions (unzipped) are grey on one side, but flipped with the reverse of the fabric to show off the blue. I am happy to send you  a sample of the fabric- or else check out: http://www.camirafabrics.com/fabrics/cave

Approx. frame dimensions: 80cm x 80 cm x 135cm

This cosy beauty would be set off by a scattering of your favourite retro cushions. Buy the sofa and a Tickety-Boo cushion from the shop and we'll throw in another cushion for free. Does our generosity know no bounds? Beat that, Tesco.

Collection or Courier only.

This item is also listed on ebay. Buy now, or make me an offer, to avoid crushing disappointment.

name: Weird Science Cushion
description:
Holli Zollinger Spoonflower navy & white chemical symbol linen-cotton print, with light blue piping and soft linen flipside. Perfect for the bonkers scientist in your life. And his/her bottom.

16" x 16" foam pad. Not removeable.

Made in Bristol.

100% Nut-free.

name: Tip Top Triangles Cocktail Chair
description:
Petite, piped, sharp-elbowed cocktail chair. Completely re-upholstered in colour-popping canvas print fabric. An absolute one-off, just for YOU.

Would suit any mad for Mad Men gal with a penchant for martinis.

Has been extensively Scotchguarded- but keep away from red wine, chicken jalfrezi, bicycle chain oil and klutzes as stains may only be sponged off.

Rescued from a caravan in the New Forest, buffed and brought back to life in Bristol.

Please contact me if you need help with shipping. I will NOT be putting this through Royal Mail...

SOLD!

name: Pretty in Pink Cocktail Chair
description:
Piped, zipped and primped to perfection. This sharp-elbowed little BEAUTY is waiting for the right Mad Men styled derriere to have a perch on it.
It's petit, completely re-upholstered and covered in Holli Zollinger Umbraline Wheat linen-cotton mix Spoonflower fabric. Perfect for the boudoir, bring out your inner minx and get mommy a cocktail!

Please note: this item is also on sale on ebay & etsy. I endeavour to keep availability up-to-date. Buy now to avoid disappointment.

name: Blonde Ercol Windsor Chair in 'Copenhagen' Holli Zollinger Spoonflower fabric
description: How do I love thee? Let me count the ways. Is it your classic retro bent wood styling or your up-to-date printed fabric? Properly piped removable zipped cushions with buffed woodwork and wonderfully working webbing?
